text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُم مَّاذَآ أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

translation.en: And when it is said to them, "What has your Lord sent down?" They say, "Legends of the former peoples
translation.id: Dan apabila dikatakan kepada mereka, "Apa yang telah diturunkan Tuhanmu?" Mereka menjawab, "Dongeng-dongeng orang dahulu
